welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Tremelo, a charming and picturesque city known for its beautiful landscapes and warm hospitality. We invite you to explore and immerse yourselves in all the wonders this city has to offer. Enjoy your stay!"

terminals.name: Terminal A
terminals.description: The main terminal at Brussels Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal B
terminals.description: A smaller terminal at Brussels Airport, primarily used for low-cost carriers.

wifi.note: Passengers can enjoy unlimited free Wi-Fi throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal for all commercial flights at Deurne/ Antwerp Airport.

terminals.name: General Aviation Terminal
terminals.description: A separate terminal for private and charter flights at Deurne/ Antwerp Airport.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Zoersel Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Zoersel Airport handles all cargo and freight operations.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
